title: How to Book || Sports Authority of India
content: How to Book || Sports Authority of India Cancel Preloader 0 Sports Authority of India Stadia Bookings ONLINE BOOKING FOR NON-SPORTS Click Here ONLINE BOOKING FOR NON-SPORTS Click Here Sports Authority of India How to Hire Venue for Sporting/Non-Sporting Event? To enquire about availability, tariff and other related amenities for booking / hiring SAI stadia (Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium (JNS), Dr. Karni Singh Shooting Range (KSSR), Dr. SPM Swimming Pool Complex (SPMSPC), Indra Gandhi Stadium Complex (IGSC), Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium (MDCNS)). Please contact the venue administrator for further details. To host any non- sport events, you need to avail NOC from Joint CP Licensing police, New Delhi. S.NO. Name of the Stadium Phone E-mail 1. Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium (JNS) 011-24369781 jns-sai@gov.in 2. Dr. Karni Singh Shooting Range (KSSR) 011-26094802 kssr-sai@gov.in 3. Dr. SPM Swimming Pool Complex (SPMSPC) 011-23094832,011-23092767 spmspc-sai@gov.in 4. Indra Gandhi Stadium Complex (IGSC) 011-23392729 igsc.sai@gov.in 5. Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium (MDCNS) 011-23389740,011-23075065 mdcns-sai@gov.in
